sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality"> <x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>When activated, the attacker chooses one item openly wielded by the target (such as a weapon, shield, or item on a belt). That item is damaged one step: to Minor if undamaged, from Minor to Moderate, or from Moderate to Major. If a weapon already suffering Major damage is the target of a successful Sunder, it is destroyed.  Sunder requires 1 advantage to activate. If activated multiple times in the same attack, each can be applied against the same weapon, potentially taking a weapon from undamaged to destroyed in a single attack.</description> <name>Sunder (Active)</name> <number>WQ0001025</number> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 05:12:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>eb9fd0282fd46450e0f497eef699b68c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 05:12:13</sys_updated_on> </x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality> </record_update>
